p: Saponin extract (QE) powder from the bark of the soap tree, Quillaja saponaria, (Sigma Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA, CAS No. S7900, 10%) was used. The powder was dissolved in distilled water to create a stock solution, which was used to prepare the different concentrations. The range of QE concentrations in water solution was based on pilot tests. Five and more replicates were prepared for each test concentration and control.
